abstract: Amazon.com has filed a law suit in New York State court to block a new law meant to force it to collect sales tax on Internet sales to residents of the state.
snippet: Amazon.com has filed a law suit in New York State court to block a new law meant to force it to collect sales tax on Internet sales to residents of the state.
lead_paragraph: Before the ink on the bill has even dried, Amazon.com has filed a suit challenging New York State’s new law that forces online retailers to collect sales taxes on shipments to state residents.

headline.main: Amazon Sues New York State to Void Sales Tax Rules
